document_data.name: Dzuntabbar
document_data.mainbody: '''Dzuntabbar''' of [[Thay]] was an individual of the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]] who briefly required the attention of [[Elminster Aumar]].
document_data.History: In late {{yearlink|1357}}, [[Elminster Aumar]] revealed to [[Storm Silverhand]] that he needed to deal with Dzuntabbar of [[Thay]] before going off to help [[Shandril Shessair]], shortly before her fight with [[Manshoon]].
